member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.App
member.summary: Defines the interaction of this application.

member.name: F:Sudoku.UI.MainPage._clickedCount
member.summary: Indicates the numbers that the button clicked.

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.MainPage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a instance with no parameters.

remarks.para: This constructor will calls the inner method called InitializeComponent, but this method will automatically iniatilize all controls in this page implicitly, but Roslyn don't know this behavior.
To be honest, I suggest the team will append onto the method InitializeComponent in order to avoid Roslyn making the error wave mark on this method.

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.MainPage.OnCounterClicked(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.param: The sender to trigger the event. The value of should be in general.
The event arguments provided. Here this argument will be a discard because the inner data is unmeaningful.

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.Startup.Configure(Microsoft.Maui.Hosting.IAppHostBuilder)
member.summary: To configure the current UI project, and creates the base information.
